This study looks at the reflectance measurements of the _Zostera noltii_ seagrass at Bourgneuf Bay in 2018 and 2025.

All analyses were performed in R version 4.5.2 [@Rversion].
All work belong to the [REWRITE project](https://rewriteproject.eu/).

# Method

Fieldwork was done in Bourgneuf Bay.
